token_modal.title: Boat's token
token_modal.message: WARNING, This access token will only be displayed once. It will not be stored and cannot be retrieved. Please be sure to save it now.
Copy paste this token into your postgsail plugin instance of signalk.

boat.signalk: Ces données sont extraites de 'Vessel Base Data' depuis SignalK.

messages.pending: Votre bateau n'a pas encore envoyé de données à PostgSail, tout devrait bien se passer lorsqu'il se connectera
messages.offline: Votre bateau est hors ligne depuis {0} mais il est configuré pour PostgSail, tout devrait bien se passer lorsqu'il reviendra en ligne
messages.online: Votre bateau est en ligne, dernières données reçues {0}
messages.plugin_version: Vous utilisez une ancienne version du plugin PostgSail. Veuillez passer à la derrière version

pushover.link: Link Your Pushover Account to Enable
pushover.connected: Your user is connected to Pushover.

telegram_bot.link: Add PostgSail bot to a group or direct chat.

msg.website: Website displayed alongside your stats, please enter the full URL starting with http:// or https://
msg.instagram_handle: Instagram link displayed alongside your stats, please enter without a leading {'@'} sign
msg.public_profile: When enabled, corresponding pages like stats, timelapse and others can be accessed by anyone without being required to login.
msg.public_logs: When enabled, your individual log details will be publicly accessible at https://iot.openplotter.cloud/{0}/log/{'id'}
msg.public_stats: When enabled, your statistics will be publicly accessible at https://iot.openplotter.cloud/{0}/stats
msg.public_logs_list: When enabled, list of all your logs will be publicly accessible at https://iot.openplotter.cloud/{0}/logs
msg.public_timelapse: When enabled, your timelapse will be publicly accessible at https://iot.openplotter.cloud/{0}/timelapse
msg.public_monitoring: When enabled, your monitoring will be publicly accessible at https://iot.openplotter.cloud/{0}/monitoring
msg.public_name: Lorsque vous activerez votre profil public, vous aurez la possibilité de choisir le nom de votre bateau
msg.public_windy: When you enable your public profile, you will have the option to transform your boat in a weather station integrate in Windy.

offline.offline: Votre navire est hors ligne. La surveillance en temps réel nécessite une connexion Internet.
offline.lastupdate: Nous n'avons reçu aucune donnée de votre bateau au cours des 70 dernières minutes.

monitoring.explore_msg: List of paths and value gather from Signalk and use to process logs, stays, moorages, maps and monitoring

badges.Helmsman: Nice work logging your first sail! You are officially a helmsman now!
badges.Wake Maker: Welcome to the 15 knot+ club ya speed demon skipper!
badges.Explorer: It looks like home is where the helm is. Cheers to 10 days away from home port!
badges.Mooring Pro: It takes a lot of skill to "thread that floating needle" but seems like you have mastered mooring with 10 nights on buoy!
badges.Anchormaster: Hook, line and sinker, you have this anchoring thing down! 25 days on the hook for you!
badges.Traveler: Who needs to fly when one can sail! You are an international sailor. À votre santé!
badges.Stormtrooper: Just like the elite defenders of the Empire, here you are, our braving your own hydro-empire in windspeeds above 30kts. Nice work trooper!
badges.Club Alaska: Home to the bears, glaciers, midnight sun and high adventure. Welcome to the Club Alaska Captain!
badges.Tropical Traveler: Look at you with your suntan, tropical drink and southern latitude!
badges.Aloha Award: Ticking off over 2300 NM across the great blue Pacific makes you the rare recipient of the Aloha Award. Well done and Aloha sailor!
badges.Navigator Award: Woohoo! You made it, Ticking off over 100NM in one go, well done sailor!
badges.Captain Award: Congratulation, you reach over 1000NM, well done sailor!

nodata.nodata: Rien ici encore! Veuillez configurer votre instance de signalk et commencer à naviguer!
nodata.start: Les choses commenceront à apparaître ici. Vous pouvez trouver les détails de votre jeton pour votre navire sur
nodata.start_link: la page du détail de votre bateau.
nodata.wait: Si vous venez d'entrer votre jeton, jetez un œil à
nodata.help: If you are not clear what you need to do for logging, please see "What do I need to use PostgSail?" question sur .
